remarks: A homomorphism of groups preserves inverses.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Dec-2014.)
statement:
ghminv.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
ghminv.y $e |- M = ( invg ` S ) $.
ghminv.z $e |- N = ( invg ` T ) $.
ghminv $p |- ( ( F e. ( S GrpHom T ) /\ X e. B ) -> ( F ` ( M ` X ) ) = ( N ` ( F ` X ) ) ) $.
